attributes.action: Cease free healthcare for those who abuse their own health & wellbeing
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned, beleve members of the public who smoke, take illicit substances or are overweight (due to gluttony and not existing medical issues) should have to fund their own health care, when their lifestyle has caused relating problems that require medical attention/surgery. If said members of the public do not have the necessary monies to pay for any required procedures, a funding scheme set up by the Department of Health will 'loan' these individuals the necessary funds to be paid back at a rate convenient to the persons in question.

rejection.details: Please see petition "NHS should not be free to all".
